outline:
1. to tie, bind, bind on, bind up, saddle, restrain, bandage, govern
    1. (Qal)
      1. to bind, bind on
      2. to bind up
    2. (Piel) to bind, restrain
    3. (Pual) to be bound up
kjv_def: bind (up), gird about, govern, healer, put, saddle, wrap about.
strongs_def: to wrap firmly (especially a turban, compress, or saddle); figuratively, to stop, to rule
